term_name: Toddler (1 year old to 2 years and 9 months)
Preschool (2 years and 9 months to Junior Kindergarten or Kindergarten)
Junior Kindergarten (Child has to be 4 by March 31st of the year entering Junior Kindergarten)
Kindergarten (child has to be 5 by August 31st of the year entering Kindergarten)
1st grade (child has to be 6 by August 31st of the year entering 1st grade)
